title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Online Bible Education: Deep Learning Through Creative Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: The decision-making processes of biblical figures can be analyzed through role-playing and applied to modern contexts
The historical context of biblical events can be explained based on virtual pilgrimage experiences through online field learning
Criteria for judging the reliability of online biblical resources can be presented through website evaluation activities
Balanced solutions to ethical dilemmas can be proposed by synthesizing diverse perspectives in discussion simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
